" 8:24 simon kiyamin prathichara, "swamin wana ma udesa yachnya, oba prakasha kara de kisiwak mata sidu wiya haki bawa ee nisa. kottawa rathmaldeniya pradeshaye transfomarayak sawikirimata giya widuli bala mandalaye sewakayaku widulisara wadi eeye (25) miyagos atha.homagama widulibala mandalayata anuyukthawa sewaya karana lakshman (26) namathi awiwahaka tharunayaku mese miyagos thibe.kottawa rathmaldeniya pradeshaye transfomarayak sawikarana athara thura, eeta ihalin thibena wot 33,000 widuli rahanaka gati me anathura siduwa atha.
